profile.name: Nature / Science
profile.description: High-impact journal style: concise, accessible, significant claims with strong evidence

learnedRules.rule: Lead with the key finding or insight, not background
Use precise, quantitative language over vague qualifiers
Connect findings to broader scientific significance
Keep sentences under 25 words when possible

framingGuidance: Frame results in terms of what they reveal, not what was done
Connect to outstanding questions in the field
Emphasize what is new and why it matters
Be direct about limitations but confident about conclusions
